languages.text: "А может это ты из ума выжил, раз смеешь дерзить Железношкурому?" {n}Вкрадчивый тон Хальбрандта исполнен столь очевидной угрозы, что ее не сделал бы яснее даже извлеченный из ножен меч.{/n}

"Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А может это ты из ума выжил, раз смеешь дерзить Железношкурому?" {n}Вкрадчивый тон Хальбрандта исполнен столь очевидной угрозы, что ее не сделал бы яснее даже извлеченный из ножен меч.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: “你竟敢对铁皮氏族的人出言不逊，说不定疯的人是你才对吧？”{n}哈尔布兰特讽刺的语气充满了威胁的意味。他的威胁无比清晰，甚至根本不需要拔出武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢对铁皮氏族的人出言不逊，说不定疯的人是你才对吧？”{n}哈尔布兰特讽刺的语气充满了威胁的意味。他的威胁无比清晰，甚至根本不需要拔出武器。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: 「気が狂ってるのはお前の方だろうな、アイアンハイドに向かってそんな無礼な口を聞くとは」{n}ハルブラントのほのめかすような口調はかなり脅迫めいており、剣を抜いたとしてもその険しい空気には匹敵しない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「気が狂ってるのはお前の方だろうな、アイアンハイドに向かってそんな無礼な口を聞くとは」{n}ハルブラントのほのめかすような口調はかなり脅迫めいており、剣を抜いたとしてもその険しい空気には匹敵しない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: «A lo mejor el que ha perdido el juicio eres tú, a juzgar por cómo le hablas a Piel de Hierro». {n}El tono insinuante de Halbrandt rezuma tanta hostilidad que ni desenvainando una espada podría haber dejado más clara su amenaza.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A lo mejor el que ha perdido el juicio eres tú, a juzgar por cómo le hablas a Piel de Hierro». {n}El tono insinuante de Halbrandt rezuma tanta hostilidad que ni desenvainando una espada podría haber dejado más clara su amenaza.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: « C'est peut-être toi qui l'as perdu si tu oses faire preuve d'une telle insolence à l'égard de Peau-de-Fer. » {n}Le ton venimeux d'Halbrandt est chargé d'une telle menace qu'il n'a nul besoin de tirer son épée pour rendre sa provocation parfaitement claire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est peut-être toi qui l'as perdu si tu oses faire preuve d'une telle insolence à l'égard de Peau-de-Fer. » {n}Le ton venimeux d'Halbrandt est chargé d'une telle menace qu'il n'a nul besoin de tirer son épée pour rendre sa provocation parfaitement claire.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Vielleicht steht eher Euer Verstand in Zweifel, wenn Ihr es wagt, Eisenhaut so unverschämt anzusprechen." {n}Halbrandts Ton ist so bedrohlich, dass selbst ein gezogenes Schwert nicht deutlicher sein könnte.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht steht eher Euer Verstand in Zweifel, wenn Ihr es wagt, Eisenhaut so unverschämt anzusprechen." {n}Halbrands Ton ist so bedrohlich, dass selbst ein gezogenes Schwert nicht deutlicher sein könnte.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Demirpost ile böyle saygısızca konuşmaya cesaret ettiğine göre asıl sen aklını kaçırmış olmalısın." {n}Halbrandt'ın imalı ses tonundaki tehdit öyle bariz ki kılıcını çekse bu kadar net mesaj veremezdi.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Perhaps it is you who's lost his mind, if you are daring to speak so insolently to Ironhide?" {n}Halbrandt's insinuating tone is dripping with such menace that even the drawing of a sword could not have made his threat any clearer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Demirpost ile böyle saygısızca konuşmaya cesaret ettiğine göre belki sen aklını kaçırmışsındır." {n}Halbrandt'ın imalı ses tonundaki tehdit öyle bariz ki kılıçlar çekilse bile bir anlamı olmaz.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
